help.description: Access the help panel of PrismBot.
help.helpCenterEmbedDescription: Greetings! You are in the help center for {botname}. To view commands, click the buttons below related to the category.
help.additionalEmbedDonation: Make a donation to the Project.
help.additionalEmbedBestSongs: View the most added songs on {botname}.
help.musicEmbedPlay: Play a song in your voice channel.
help.musicEmbedClear: Make the bot clear the queue and join your voice channel.
help.musicEmbedJoin: Make the bot join your voice channel.
help.musicEmbedJump: Make the bot jump to a specific track in the queue.
help.musicEmbedBack: Make the bot go back to the previous song.
help.musicEmbedLeave: Make the bot clear the queue and leave your voice channel.
help.musicEmbedPause: Make the bot pause the current song.
help.musicEmbedResume: Make the bot resume your music.
help.musicEmbedStop: Make the bot stop playing your tracks.
help.musicEmbedSearch: Make the bot search for a specific song and display the result.
help.musicEmbedRemove: Make the bot remove a song from the queue.
help.musicEmbedSkip: Make the bot skip to the next song.

back.description: Make the bot go back to the previous song.
back.NotPlaying: ‚ùå You must be playing a track to use this command!

jump.Options: Enter the position or title of the track you want to jump to

leave.description: Make the bot clear the queue and leave your voice channel.
leave.Success: üëç Done, cleared the queue. Now leaving the voice channel.

loop.Queue: üëç Done, now I will repeat **the entire queue.**
loop.Track: üëç Done, now I will repeat **only the current song.**

queue.EndQueue: Here is the end of this playlist.

remove.Options: Enter the position or title of the track you want to remove
remove.Success: üëç Done, the song `{input}` has been removed from the queue.

resume.Success: üëç Done, the song has been successfully resumed!

search.Options: Enter the name of the artist, song, or album
search.NoMatchesFound: ‚ùå Song not found. Please try again!
search.OnlyUserButton: ‚ùå Hey! This command doesn't belong to you

skip.Success: üëç Done, skipped to the next song.

stop.description: Make the bot stop playing your tracks.

bestsongs.description: View the most added songs on PrismBot.
bestsongs.AdditionalMessage: This information is taken from our database. All songs are automatically counted.

donation.description: Make a donation to the Project.
donation.donationEmbedDescription:
Welcome to the official donation page of PrismBot, your musical companion on Discord! PrismBot is a passionate and dedicated project aiming to deliver incredible musical experiences to thousands of Discord servers worldwide. Like any ambitious project, we need your support to continue growing and improving.

**What is PrismBot?**

PrismBot is a feature-rich, multifunctional music bot designed to elevate the quality of music in Discord servers. With a wide range of customizable commands and a user-friendly interface, PrismBot allows you and your friends to enjoy high-quality music effortlessly.

**Why donate to PrismBot?**

Keeping PrismBot running effectively and constantly improving requires financial resources. By donating to PrismBot, you will be directly contributing to:

**1. Continuous Improvements:** Our development team is committed to enhancing PrismBot with new features, performance updates, and regular bug fixes to ensure the best musical experience possible.

**2. Stability and Reliability:** Maintaining PrismBot servers running reliably is crucial. With your help, we can invest in a robust infrastructure to keep the bot online 24/7.

**3. Support and Community:** With donations, we can provide prompt technical support and build a stronger, more engaged community around PrismBot, helping users get the most out of the bot.

dmMessage: ‚ùå You cannot execute commands in my DM.
errorMessage: ‚ùå An error occurred while executing this command.
NotConnected: ‚ùå You need to be connected to a voice channel before using this command.
WithoutPermissionSpeak: ‚ùå I don't have permission to speak in this voice channel!
WithoutPermissionConnect: ‚ùå I don't have permission to connect to this voice channel!
AlreadyConnected: ‚ùå Someone is already playing music in a different channel!
NotPlaying: ‚ùå You must be playing a track to use this command!
playingLive: üî¥ Playing LIVE (This video is live, with no defined duration).
streamProcessError: ‚ùå There was an error processing your song. Try again!
